abstract: The Buddh International Circuit, which is nearing completion in the northern India state of Uttar Pradesh, is being met by fanfare, farmer protests and tax questions.
snippet: The Buddh International Circuit, which is nearing completion in the northern India state of Uttar Pradesh, is being met by fanfare, farmer protests and tax questions.
lead_paragraph: Our colleagues at the India Ink blog are asking if the Buddh International Circuit, India's first Formula One arena, will be ready on Oct. 28 for the first practice session. Even Bernie Ecclestone had his doubts until recently.

headline.main: Formula One Arrives in India, and Controversy Follows
